SELECT w.id, w.clname `name`, w.teacher, w.clstu_num `stu_num`, w.grade_id "grade.id", w.grname "grade.name", w.grstu_num "grade.stuNum", w.major_id "major.id", w.maname "major.name", w.introduce "major.introduce" FROM ( SELECT cl.id, cl.`name` AS clname, cl.teacher, cl.stu_num AS clstu_num, cl.grade_id, gr.`name` AS grname, gr.stu_num AS grstu_num, cl.major_id, ma.`name` AS maname, ma.introduce, ma.department_id FROM class cl LEFT JOIN grade gr ON cl.grade_id = gr.id LEFT JOIN major ma ON cl.major_id = ma.id ORDER BY cl.id DESC ) w
